name: Tall Tales Blanj REMASTERED
description:
The story of how a burger lover became a hero in HD!

Controls:

Left And Right - Walk/Hold both then jump to super jump

Z or SPACE - Jump

C - Run

decided to remaster my first game of 2021 back in November I then decided to upload it to NewGrounds so I could get better reviews

List of improved things

  • Extras: Shows notes, concept art, and more.
  • Better graphics.
  • Changed music (composed by Bliz)
  • Better level design
  • Life counter
